Class AppBooseFacade

Namespace
BradleyLeach_BooseApp
Assembly
BradleyLeach_BooseApp.dll

Facade class for storing all BOOSE app funcionality together, keeps GUI form clean from any BOOSE dependent code.

public sealed class AppBooseFacade
